snippet: Facing criticism over the ineffectiveness of current efforts to thwart Tehran's nuclear ambitions, the House approved a new set of punitive measures. Senate passage is expected this week.
abstract: Facing criticism over the ineffectiveness of current efforts to thwart Tehran's nuclear ambitions, the House approved a new set of punitive measures. Senate passage is expected this week.

headline.main: House Approves Tightened Sanctions Against Iran
